Text: Thanks Footy, I was faithfully waiting for the BBC coverage and you delivered as always. Much apprecated!
Thank you so much! Really don't understand why people seem to like sky coverage better!

I don't understand either. The main presenter is terrible and the Skypad thing is annoying, especially that Georgie bird! 

On a different matter, I don't know why Footy but your MP4 files play on my PS3 but only the video, no audio??? All other MP4 is download work fine. Why would this be?
EdoSensei - maybe it's because PS3 don't support HE-AAC+SBR ? if so then try something like this: ffmpeg -i file.mp4 -vcodec copy -acodec libvo_aacenc -ab 96k -ac 2 out-file.mp4
